entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 10.
